description: Trovat Longsleeve Shirt Men. A casual shirt for hiking adventures. Made from 60% organic cotton and 40% polyester, this fabric combines the advantages of both materials: while the cotton gives the shirt its pleasant feel, the polyester content ensures quick-drying properties. Modern, understated, functional: the Trovat Longsleeve Shirt Men.
name: Mammut Trovat LS Shirt - Mens
